text:
State Service (Restructuring) Order 2015

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council and on the recommendation of the Minister, make the following order under section 11 of the State Service Act 2000 .

13 April 2015

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

WILLIAM E. F. HODGMAN

Premier

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the State Service (Restructuring) Order 2015 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on 1 July 2015.

3. Change of name
    The name of the State authority known as Tasmanian Health Organisation – North is changed to the Tasmanian Health Service.

4. Amalgamation of State authorities
    Tasmanian Health Organisation – North West, and Tasmanian Health Organisation – South are amalgamated with the Tasmanian Health Service.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 22 April 2015

This order is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
